parameters.name: MediaId
parameters.description: The ID of the media file for which you want to remove a tag. To obtain the ID of a media file, you can call the [AddMedia](~~44458~~) operation. Alternatively, perform the following operations in the ApsaraVideo Media Processing (MPS) console: In the left-side navigation pane, choose **Media Management** > **Media List**. Find the required video and click **Manage**. The ID of the video is displayed on the Basics tab.
